Name: butane to generic market for generic C4 hydrocarbons | generic C4 hydrocarbons | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/28346/documentation

This is a linking activity which links the product of butene, mixed to the generic market for generic C4 hydrocarbons,

The activity starts with the reception of raw materials at the factory gate.

The activity ends with the production of generic C4 hydrocarbons for the generic market.
